data.message: You may've picked an unfortunate time to show up, Mister President.  Really wish you'd kick off an election fraud/voter suppression investigation.  Alot of democrats are leaving the party after years & years of loyalty.  Your response, "Don't boo, vote." was rather insensitive to those who tried but were disenfranchised.  :(  It's not too late to do the right thing & call for an investigation.
